Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Aminta in Sorrento, you'll be connected to the convention center and convenient to Marina Grande and Piazza Tasso. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Wooden Marquetry Workshop-Museum and Dali Universe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a memory foam bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this Beaux Arts hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 3500 meters.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Sorrento? This hotel has facilities measuring 323 square feet (30 square meters), including a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Dali Universe - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Aminta is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 29.1 km / 18.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Aminta is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 29.5 km / 18.4 mi.
